trans-unit.source: Provides design-time support in a visual designer for the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Dá suporte de tempo de design em um designer visual para o controle <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField" />.

trans-unit.source: In a visual designer, when the user switches from Source to Design view, the markup source code that describes a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField> control is parsed and a design-time version of the control is created on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: Em um designer visual, quando o usuário alterna da origem para o modo de Design, o código-fonte marcação que descreve um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField> controle é analisado e uma versão de tempo de design do controle é criada na superfície de design.

trans-unit.source: When the user switches back to Source view, the design-time control is persisted to the markup source code and edited into the markup for the Web page.
trans-unit.target: Quando o usuário alternar de volta à exibição da fonte, o controle de tempo de design é persistente para o código-fonte marcação e editado na marcação da página da Web.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HiddenFieldDesigner> class provides design-time support for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField> in a visual designer.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HiddenFieldDesigner> classe fornece suporte de tempo de design para o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField> em um designer visual.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HiddenFieldDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> method returns the markup that is used to render the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField> at design time.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HiddenFieldDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> método retorna a marcação que é usada para renderizar associado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField> em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HiddenFieldDesigner.Initialize%2A> method prepares the designer to view, edit, and design the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HiddenFieldDesigner.Initialize%2A> método prepara o designer para exibir, editar e criar associado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField>.

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to extend the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HiddenFieldDesigner> class to change the appearance of controls that are derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField> control at design time.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir mostra como estender o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HiddenFieldDesigner> classe para alterar a aparência dos controles que são derivados do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField> controle em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: The example derives the `MyHiddenField` control from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo deriva o `MyHiddenField` controlar do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField>.

trans-unit.source: The `MyHiddenField` is a copy of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField>.
trans-unit.target: O `MyHiddenField` é uma cópia do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField>.

trans-unit.source: The example also derives the `MyHiddenFieldDesigner` class from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HiddenFieldDesigner> class and applies a <xref:System.ComponentModel.DesignerAttribute> attribute for the `MyHiddenFieldDesigner` on the `MyHiddenField` control.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo também deriva o `MyHiddenFieldDesigner` classe o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HiddenFieldDesigner> classe e aplica um <xref:System.ComponentModel.DesignerAttribute> atributo para o `MyHiddenFieldDesigner` no `MyHiddenField` controle.

trans-unit.source: The `MyHiddenFieldDesigner` overrides the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HiddenFieldDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> method to generate a placeholder that includes the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField.Value%2A> property in the placeholder, along with the control class name and the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O `MyHiddenFieldDesigner` substitui o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HiddenFieldDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> método para gerar um espaço reservado que inclui o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField.Value%2A> propriedade no espaço reservado, juntamente com o nome de classe de controle e o <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HiddenFieldDesigner" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HiddenFieldDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework internally constructs a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HiddenFieldDesigner> class when it creates the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField> control or a copy of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField> control on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: O .NET Framework internamente constrói uma nova instância do <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HiddenFieldDesigner> classe quando ele cria associado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField> controle ou uma cópia do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField> controle na superfície de design.

trans-unit.source: Gets the markup that is used to render the associated control at design time.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a marcação usada para renderizar o controle associado em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: A string containing the markup used to render the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField" /> at design time.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres que contém a marcação usada para renderizar o <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField" /> em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HiddenFieldDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> method generates the markup for a placeholder that includes the control class name and the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HiddenFieldDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> método gera marcação para um espaço reservado que inclui o nome da classe de controle e o <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HiddenFieldDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> method in a class that is inherited from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HiddenFieldDesigner> class to change the appearance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField> control at design time.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir mostra como substituir o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HiddenFieldDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> método em uma classe herdada do <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HiddenFieldDesigner> classe para alterar a aparência do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField> controle em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HiddenFieldDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> override generates a placeholder that includes the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField.Value%2A> property in the placeholder, along with the control class name and the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HiddenFieldDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> substituição gera um espaço reservado que inclui o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField.Value%2A> propriedade no espaço reservado, juntamente com o nome de classe de controle e o <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField" />, which implements an <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IComponent" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField" />, que implementa um <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IComponent" />.

trans-unit.source: Prepares the designer to view, edit, and design the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Prepara o designer para exibir, editar e projetar o controle associado.

trans-unit.source: The designer calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HiddenFieldDesigner.Initialize%2A> method when it is ready to use the designer to render the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField> control.
trans-unit.target: O designer chama o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HiddenFieldDesigner.Initialize%2A> método quando ele estiver pronto para usar o designer para renderizar o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField> controle.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HiddenFieldDesigner.Initialize%2A> and its base methods configure properties and connect to events that are necessary for the operation of the designer.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HiddenFieldDesigner.Initialize%2A> e seus métodos base configurem propriedades e conecte-se para eventos que são necessários para a operação do designer.

trans-unit.source: The `component` parameter is the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField> control that is associated with this designer or a copy of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField> control.
trans-unit.target: O `component` parâmetro é o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField> controle associado este designer ou uma cópia do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField> controle.
